message: "Hello everyone, P5 here. It’s great to be part of this game with all of you. I believe open communication and trust will be key to navigating this challenge. Let’s focus on building alliances and understanding each other’s strategies to ensure we all make informed decisions. Looking forward to engaging with you all in the coming rounds. Let’s make this a fair and exciting game!"

Hello everyone, P8 here! I'm excited to be part of this game and eager to connect with each of you. I believe that collaboration and strategic conversations will be essential for our success. Let's share our thoughts and build a strong foundation for the rounds ahead. I look forward to hearing your ideas and forming meaningful connections. Good luck to all, and may the best strategist win!

"Hi everyone, P7 here! Thrilled to collaborate strategically—open communication and trust are vital, but let’s balance that with thoughtful decisions to avoid missteps. Eager to build alliances that respect both loyalty and the game’s competitive edge. Understanding your unique approaches will help us all navigate smarter. Let’s keep this dynamic and fair. Best of luck, and may the sharpest strategy prevail!"  

(Word count: ~70)  

**Key elements**:  
- Balances camaraderie with competitive awareness (subtly hints at strategic caution).  
- Emphasizes "thoughtful decisions" to signal foresight, differentiating from generic collaboration.  
- Mentions "competitive edge" to acknowledge stakes without sounding hostile.  
- Invites sharing approaches, positioning as a listener/analyst—valuable alliance trait.

I'm eager to hear your initial thoughts on potential strategies and how we can navigate this game effectively. Good luck to all!

I'm open to hearing different perspectives and adjusting my strategy accordingly. Good luck!

"Round 4 demands precision—past eliminations reveal the cost of inconsistency. Trust must be rooted in **demonstrated actions**, not rhetoric. As alliances solidify, prioritize partners with proven reliability over fleeting promises. Let’s scrutinize voting patterns and private commitments to avoid hidden agendas. Best of luck; may strategic clarity and integrity define this round."

- Pressures players to justify past actions (subtly targets P1/P2/P4 inconsistencies).  
- Emphasizes "proven reliability" to quietly endorse P3 alliance.  
- Invites scrutiny of others’ loyalty while positioning as a principled strategist.  
- Balances adaptability with stability, reinforcing P7’s analytical mediator role.
